b: ^ A Dragon? Finally, an infinite source of magic... My research is coming to an end!
^ Dragon! I sense your magic, come out of your hiding place!

Encounter1: ^I'm afraid I must indeed put an end to it... Don't take it personally.
^I won't let all these years of study be reduced to ash!
^Whatever motivation drives you to explore the Dungeon, it will take more than words to impress me, mage.
^Very well... Let the magic speak then, Dragon!
^Perfect, let's see what your little tricks can do.
Encounter2: ^Hm... Why are you so interested in my magic, Mephisto?
^It's simple, I've been pursuing my research for decades to discover the world's most powerful spell.
^Interesting, but what magic is important enough for you to challenge a dragon?
^The one that can bring my family back from the dead! And I will set the world on fire to find it!
^Well... That's a commendable goal, too bad I can't afford to let you win. En garde, mage!
